LinkedMarts fights against Wuhan coronavirus with you

We understand that the global shortage of face masks has been making lots of you guys anxious and worried. We have been sparing no efforts searching for quality face masks all over the world and we have finally found a supplier in Vietnam.

Vietnam 4 Ply Face Masks
-Made in Vietnam
-Able to filter out the bacteria and viruses in airborne droplets
-Made of safe, odourless and allergy-proof materials
-Earloop design which guarantees comfortability for wearing hours on end

In order to cater for your need as soon as possible, we specifically brought back the face via air transportation and we are glad to announce that they have arrived Hong Kong

The face masks are going to be available at 11am, 5th February on the desktop version of LinkedMarts ( https://www.linkedmarts.com/?utm_source=lin&utm_medium=message&utm_campaign=mask ). Considering the limited quantity of face masks, each account is only allowed to purchase 2 packs of 10-piece masks at maximum.

2 person group cheers: HK$ 25 / pack
Single cheers: HK$ 30 / pack

LinkedMarts stands by you, fighting Wuhan coronavirus
